subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
Soccer
lead_paragraph: This World Cup is a tournament of all-star squads, and it takes a special type of coach, like Jürgen Klinsmann of Germany, to turn these national patchworks into true teams.
snippet: This World Cup is a tournament of all-star squads, and it takes a special type of coach, like Jürgen Klinsmann of Germany, to turn these national patchworks into true teams.
